member.name: T:NetFx.StringlyTyped
member.summary: Utilities for rendering .NET types as C# type names, with support for generics, nested types, type name simplification via "using" scopes, etc.

member.name: M:NetFx.StringlyTyped.ToCodeName(System.Type)
member.summary: Gets the C# name for the type, including proper rendering of generics, using the simple name of types.
member.remarks: For example, for a generic enumerable of boolean, which has a full name of System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1[[System.Boolean, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]], this method returns IEnumerable<Boolean>.
member.param: The type to convert to a simple C# type name.

member.name: M:NetFx.StringlyTyped.ToCodeFullName(System.Type)
member.summary: Gets the C# name for the type, including proper rendering of generics, using full names of types.
member.remarks: For example, for a generic enumerable of boolean, which has a full name of System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1[[System.Boolean, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]], this method returns System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Boolean>.
member.param: The type to convert to a C# full type name.

member.name: M:NetFx.StringlyTyped.GetCodeName(NetFx.StringlyTyped.IStringlyContext,System.Type)
member.summary: Gets the safe shortened name of a type that can be used in a given context, considering the already determined , such as in code generation.

member.name: M:NetFx.StringlyTyped.AddType(NetFx.StringlyTyped.IStringlyScope,System.Type)
member.summary: Adds the given type to the scope of used types.

member.name: M:NetFx.StringlyTyped.AddTypes(NetFx.StringlyTyped.IStringlyScope,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Type})
member.summary: Adds the given types to the scope of used types.

member.name: M:NetFx.StringlyTyped.AddTypes(NetFx.StringlyTyped.IStringlyScope,System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Adds all the exported (public) types in the given assembly to the scope of used types.

member.name: M:NetFx.StringlyTyped.BeginScope
member.summary: Creates a new stringly scope, which can be used to register types that will be used as strings, so that safe code imports can be determined and type names can be shortened to the safest form.
member.remarks: The scope takes into account all type names in use, and determines what namespaces can be safely removed from certain type names without introducing ambiguities.

member.name: T:NetFx.StringlyTyped.IStringlyScope
member.summary: Provides a stringly scope, which can be used to register types that will be used as strings, so that safe code imports can be determined and type names can be shortened to the safest form.
member.remarks: The scope takes into account all type names in use, and determines what namespaces can be safely removed from certain type names without introducing ambiguities.

member.name: M:NetFx.StringlyTyped.IStringlyScope.AddType(System.String)
member.summary: Adds the given type to the scope if it wasn't added already.

member.name: M:NetFx.StringlyTyped.IStringlyScope.Build
member.summary: Builds a context from the registrations in the scope.

member.name: T:NetFx.StringlyTyped.IStringlyContext
member.summary: A context where types can be used safely as strings that are shortened safely by extracting .

member.name: M:NetFx.StringlyTyped.IStringlyContext.GetCodeName(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the name of the type that can be used in code generation, considering the already determined .

member.name: P:NetFx.StringlyTyped.IStringlyContext.SafeImports
member.summary: Gets the list of safe imports for type map in use.

member.name: T:NetFx.StringlyTyped.StringlyContext
member.summary: Manages type registrations.

member.name: F:NetFx.StringlyTyped.StringlyContext.IsCSharpGenericType
member.summary: Checks whether the type contains the < and > characters that denotes a C# generic type.

member.name: F:NetFx.StringlyTyped.StringlyContext.IsFullGenericType
member.summary: Checks whether the type contains the ` but also the generic type arguments with [[ and ]].

member.name: F:NetFx.StringlyTyped.StringlyContext.IsOpenGenericType
member.summary: Checks whether the type contains the `1 (`arity) which denotes an open generic type.

member.name: F:NetFx.StringlyTyped.StringlyContext.IsNestedType
member.summary: Checks whether the type is a nested type by finding the '+' symbol.

member.name: F:NetFx.StringlyTyped.StringlyContext.typeNameMap
member.summary: Gets the type map built so far, where the keys are the full type names, and the value is the type name to use in code generation.

member.name: M:NetFx.StringlyTyped.StringlyContext.GetCodeName(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the name of the type that can be used in code generation, considering the already determined .

member.name: M:NetFx.StringlyTyped.StringlyContext.BuildSafeTypeNames
member.summary: Searches the type map for potential simplifications to type names. All type names that are unique across all used namespaces are turned into their simple type name (without the namespace).

member.name: M:NetFx.StringlyTyped.StringlyContext.BuildSafeImports
member.summary: From the type map, finds those namespaces that can be safely imported ("using" in C#) without causing type collisions among the type names in the map.

member.name: M:NetFx.StringlyTyped.StringlyContext.SanitizeGenerics(System.String)
member.summary: Sanitizes the generics.

member.name: P:NetFx.StringlyTyped.StringlyContext.SafeImports
member.summary: Gets the list of safe imports for type map in use.

member.name: T:NetFx.StringlyTyped.StringlyContext.TypeName
member.summary: Helper class used to build the hierarchy of type names in a generic type name.

member.name: F:NetFx.StringlyTyped.StringlyContext.Expressions.GenericParameters
member.summary: Matches the generic type and its parameter type names with C# syntax: for System.IEnumerable{System.Boolean}, matches System.IEnumerable and System.Boolean

member.name: F:NetFx.StringlyTyped.StringlyContext.Expressions.ComaWithoutSpace
member.summary: Matches two identifiers that are separated by a coma but without a whitespace after the coma, such as Boolean,String.

member.name: F:NetFx.StringlyTyped.StringlyContext.Expressions.FullAssemblyName
member.summary: Matches the assembly part of an assembly qualified type name (i.e. , mscorlib, Version=..., Culture=..., PublicKeyToken=...).

member.name: F:NetFx.StringlyTyped.StringlyContext.Expressions.GenericsArity
member.summary: Matches the arity part of a generics type, like IEnumerable`1 (would match `1).

member.name: F:NetFx.StringlyTyped.StringlyContext.Expressions.GenericsArityAndBracket
member.summary: Matches the arity part of a generics type, like IEnumerable`1[[System.Boolean]] (would match `1[).
